alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, southwestern Shackelford and northern Taylor Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Butman, or near Coronados Camp, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, View, Hamby, Coronados Camp, Caps, Dyess Afb, Potosi, Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Camp Butman and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 269 and 301. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
